item.title: React vs. Vue: An Explorative Comparison (2020)
item.description: I recently wrote an article for Josh Software, a software consultancy that I began working for in April of this year. It’s about the differences between React.js and Vue.js (version 2) and explores those differences from a variety of perspectives for the benefit of front-end developers. Coming into the research phase of this article, I hadn’t seriously done anything with front-end since the days of Netscape Navigator! I’ve of course kept up with changes over the years, but I haven’t really worked in front end exclusively or heavily since the mid to late 2000’s.

item.title: Fixing Safari's Cache With Vue.js (Developer Mode) (2020)
item.description: I happen to like Apple’s Safari browser, and I’d like to use it when developing stuff with Vue.js. I ran into a problem with this, however: Safari would cache the response from the live-reload development server on localhost, so that when I made changes it didn’t update, even when hitting the reload button. I think I’ve solved this though with a Cache-Control header configued in the project’s vue.config.js file. tl;dr Put this in a file at project root called vue.
